Navigation for ASP.NET Web Forms

Description:

Navigation for ASP.NET Web Forms manages movement and data passing between ASPX
pages in a unit-testable manner. There is no client-side logic, so it works in
all browsers, and no server-side cache, so it works with the browser back button.

Features:

-Loosely coupled pages
-Typed data passing
-Empty code-behinds
-Unit-testability
-Secure applications
-Problem-free browser back button
-Context-sensitive bread crumb trail
-ASP.NET data binding integration
-Automatic ASP.NET Ajax history navigation
-ASP.NET routing integration
-Progressive enhancement
-Single page applications
-Mobile and Display Modes support
